weekly_top_story.headline: Maldives Implements Smoking Ban for All Born After 2007, Becoming First Nation with Generational Tobacco Prohibition
weekly_top_story.summary: The Maldives has introduced a groundbreaking policy banning smoking for anyone born after January 1, 2007, marking a significant public health milestone with potential to inspire global tobacco control efforts.

stories.headline: Sudan Cities Al-Fashir and Kadugli Face Acute Famine Amid Ongoing Conflict
stories.summary: Famine conditions have been declared in two Sudanese cities following sieges and conflict, highlighting a worsening humanitarian crisis with urgent needs for international aid.

stories.headline: Saudi Crown Prince Mohammed bin Salman to Visit White House November 18
stories.summary: Saudi Arabia’s Crown Prince schedules a key official visit to the U.S. amid ongoing international relations recalibration, signaling strategic diplomacy between the two nations.

stories.headline: Ukraine Receives Additional US Patriot Air Defense Systems to Counter Russian Attacks
stories.summary: The United States has delivered more Patriot missile defense systems to Ukraine, bolstering its capabilities amid ongoing conflict and raising the stakes in Eastern Europe.
